member.name: T:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter
member.summary: An object with a method that converts a given block of statements to a list of IL operations, exception information and possibly some private helper types.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.#ctor(Microsoft.Cci.IMetadataHost,Microsoft.Cci.IMethodDefinition,Microsoft.Cci.ISourceLocationProvider)
member.summary: Initializes an object with a method that converts a given block of statements to a list of IL operations, exception information and possibly some private helper types.
member.param: An object representing the application that is hosting the converter. It is used to obtain access to some global objects and services such as the shared name table and the table for interning references.
The method that contains the block of statements that will be converted.
An object that can map the ILocation objects found in the block of statements to IPrimarySourceLocation objects. May be null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.#ctor(Microsoft.Cci.IMetadataHost,Microsoft.Cci.IMethodDefinition,Microsoft.Cci.ISourceLocationProvider,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{Microsoft.Cci.IBlockStatement,System.UInt32})
member.summary: Initializes an object with a method that converts a given block of statements to a list of IL operations, exception information and possibly some private helper types.
member.param: An object representing the application that is hosting the converter. It is used to obtain access to some global objects and services such as the shared name table and the table for interning references.
The method that contains the block of statements that will be converted.
An object that can map the ILocation objects found in the block of statements to IPrimarySourceLocation objects. May be null.
A map that indicates how many iterator locals are present in a given block. Only useful for generated MoveNext methods. May be null.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.currentBreakTarget
member.summary: A label for the instruction to where a break statement should currently branch to.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.currentContinueTarget
member.summary: A label for the instruction to where a continue statement should currently branch to.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.currentExpressionIsStatement
member.summary: True when the binary expression currently being processed is the top level expression of an ExpressionStatement and it has a target expression as its left operand (i.e. it is an assignment statement of the form tgt op= src). Be sure to clear this flag before any sub expresions are processed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.currentTryCatchFinallyEnd
member.summary: A label for the first instruction that comes after the current TryCatchFinally statement.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.currentTryCatch
member.summary: The TryCatchFinally statement for which IL is currently being generated.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.endOfMethod
member.summary: A label for the final (return) instruction in the current method, or the instruction that loads the argument of the final return instruction. If there is no final return intruction, this is location of the instruction following the final instruction (which of course does not exist).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.generator
member.summary: On object into which IL instructions are generated.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.host
member.summary: An object representing the application that is hosting the converter. It is used to obtain access to some global objects and services such as the shared name table and the table for interning references.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.labelFor
member.summary: A map from source label name unique keys to ILGenerator labels.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.lastStatementWasUnconditionalTransfer
member.summary: True if the last generated statement tranferred control unconditionally, and hence an instruction at the current location can only be reached via a branch.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.localIndex
member.summary: A map from ILocalDefinition instances to indices that can be used in IL instructions referring to locals.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.method
member.summary: The method whose CodeModel body is being converted to IL instructions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.minizeCodeSize
member.summary: If true, code generation emphasizes small code size over patterns that make debugging better.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.mostNestedTryCatchFor
member.summary: A map from labels (and labeled statements) to the most nested try catch that contains them. If a branch is enountered to a label and the current try catch is not the one that contains the label, then the branch leaves the current try catch block (and thus must become a leave instruction).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.returnLocal
member.summary: A local (temporary) that holds the return value until control reaches the end of the method body. Only used if minimizeCodeSize is false or if the return statement is inside a try catch.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.sourceLocationProvider
member.summary: An object that can map the ILocation objects found in the block of statements to IPrimarySourceLocation objects.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.trackExpressionSourceLocations
member.summary: If true, the generated IL keeps track of the source locations of expressions, not just statements.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.localVariables
member.summary: A list of all the local variable definitions that were encountered during the translation to IL.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.iteratorLocalCount
member.summary: A map that indicates how many iterator locals are present in a given block. Only useful for generated MoveNext methods. May be null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.EmitSourceLocation(Microsoft.Cci.IExpression)
member.summary: Report the current expression to the IL generator. The source locations of the current expression will be wrapped up as an IExpressionSourceLocation object and stored in the Location property of the next IL instruction that is created by the IL generator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetParameterIndex(Microsoft.Cci.IParameterDefinition)
member.summary: Translates the parameter list position of the given parameter to an IL parameter index. In other words, it adds 1 to the parameterDefinition.Index value if the containing method has an implicit this parameter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAddition)
member.summary: Generates IL for the specified addition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAddressableExpression)
member.summary: Generates IL for the specified addressable expression.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAddressDereference)
member.summary: Generates IL for the specified address dereference.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAddressOf)
member.summary: Generates IL for the specified address of.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAnonymousDelegate)
member.summary: Generates IL for the specified anonymous delegate.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IArrayIndexer)
member.summary: Generates IL for the specified array indexer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAssertStatement)
member.summary: Throws an exception when executed: IAssertStatement nodes must be replaced before converting the Code Model to IL.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAssignment)
member.summary: Generates IL for the specified assignment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.VisitAssignment(Microsoft.Cci.IAssignment,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates IL for the assignment.
member.param: if set to true [treat as statement].

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TraverseChildren(Microsoft.Cci.IAssumeStatement)
member.summary: Throws an exception when executed: IAssumeStatement nodes must be replaced before converting the Code Model to IL.

member.summary: Generates IL for the specified bitwise and.

member.summary: Generates IL for the specified bitwise or.

member.summary: Generates IL for the specified block expression.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetBodySize
member.summary: Returns the size in bytes of the serialized method body generated by this converter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetIteratorScopes
member.summary: Returns a local scope for each local variable in the iterator that generated the MoveNext method body that was converted to IL by this converter. The scopes may be duplicated and occur in the same order as the local variable declarations occur in the iterator. If this converter did not convert a MoveNext method, the result is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetLocalScopes
member.summary: Returns zero or more local (block) scopes into which the CLR IL operations of this converted Code Model block is organized.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetLocalVariables
member.summary: Returns all of the local variables (including compiler generated temporary variables) that are local to the block of statements translated by this converter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetNamespaceScopes
member.summary: Returns zero or more namespace scopes into which the namespace type containing the given method body has been nested. These scopes determine how simple names are looked up inside the method body. There is a separate scope for each dotted component in the namespace type name. For istance namespace type x.y.z will have two namespace scopes, the first is for the x and the second is for the y.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetOperations
member.summary: Returns the IL operations that correspond to the statements that have been converted to IL by this converter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetOperationExceptionInformation
member.summary: Returns zero or more exception exception information blocks (information about handlers, filters and finally blocks) that correspond to try-catch-finally constructs that appear in the statements that have been converted to IL by this converter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetPrivateHelperTypes
member.summary: Returns zero or more types that are used to keep track of information needed to implement the statements that have been converted to IL by this converter. For example, any closure classes needed to compile anonymous delegate expressions (lambdas) will be returned by this method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.ConvertToIL(Microsoft.Cci.IBlockStatement)
member.summary: Traverses the given block of statements in the context of the given method to produce a list of IL operations, exception information blocks (the locations of handlers, filters and finallies) and any private helper types (for example closure classes) that represent the semantics of the given block of statements. The results of the traversal can be retrieved via the GetOperations, GetOperationExceptionInformation and GetPrivateHelperTypes methods.
member.param: A block of statements that are to be converted to IL.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.MaximumStackSizeNeeded
member.summary: The maximum number of stack slots that will be needed by an interpreter of the IL produced by this converter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.MinimizeCodeSize
member.summary: If true, code generation emphasizes small code size over patterns that make debugging better.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.TrackExpressionSourceLocations
member.summary: If true, the generated IL keeps track of the source locations of expressions, not just statements.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Cci.CodeModelToILConverter.GetTypeFromHandle
member.summary: A reference to System.Type.GetTypeFromHandle(System.Runtime.TypeHandle).
